#summary Data-E serialization parameters used in Caja-CapTP.
#labels Phase-Design

`defaultEnv` and `defaultUnenv` in the Data-E module provide an environment whose contents are
  * those of the Cajita `___.sharedImports` object, and
  * `DataE_JS1_builtinsMaker` which is [http://code.google.com/p/caja-captp/source/browse/trunk/test/call-uncall.updoc the builtinsMaker object from the Data-E module]. The "1" is a version number for compatibility in the event that its protocol is incompatibly changed.

The env used by CapTP is the `defaultEnv` plus the [http://wiki.erights.org/wiki/CapTP#Data-E_configuration CapTP-specific exits].
